function.name: get_intraday_intensities
function.description: Retrieve intraday minute-level intensities data for a given date and time window.

start.description: The time in the format HH:mm.

end.description: The time in the format HH:mm.

function.name: create_activity_plan
function.description: Creates or updates a user's weekly activity goal.

goal_type.description: Type of the weekly activity goal.

value.description: Value of the weekly activity goal.

function.name: get_activity_plan
function.description: Retrieves the user's weekly activity goal. This tool applies to weekly goals.
